channel.title: CVE Feed for RoboDK -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for RoboDK -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-1516|2024-08-02T05:49:11.662Z -- robodk -- robodk
item.description: RoboDK versions 5.5.3 and prior contain an insecure permission assignment to critical directories vulnerability, which could allow a local user to escalate privileges and write files to the RoboDK process and achieve code execution. Â

item.title: CVE-2024-0257|2024-08-01T17:41:16.231Z -- robodk -- robodk
item.description:
RoboDK v5.5.4
is vulnerable to heap-based buffer overflow while processing a specific project file. The resulting memory corruption may crash the application.

item.title: CVE-2024-0257|2024-04-17T19:57:33.707Z -- robodk -- robodk
item.description:
RoboDK v5.5.4
is vulnerable to heap-based buffer overflow while processing a specific project file. The resulting memory corruption may crash the application.
